StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_DBAInsertUpdateUserList]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@userid varchar(30), @mcc varchar(5)
as
declare @updatedate date.me, @login varchar(15)
set @login = (select system_user) set @updatedate = getdate()
--- Add the user account if it doesn't exist.
if not exists (select 1 from user_list where user_id = @userid)
begin insert into user_list (user_id, mcc_code, user_login, update_date) values (@userid, @mcc, @login, @updatedate)
print @userid + ' ' + 'has been added'
end
--- If the user account already exists, update the MCC Code.
else begin update user_list set mcc_code = @mcc, user_login = @login, update_date = getdate() where user_id = @userid
print 'MCC Code for ' + @userid + ' ' + 'has been updated'
end
